title: muruganai bhaji
sahitya:
muruganai bhaji manamE tirumAl maruganai bhaji manamE
(tisram) mukkaNNaN maghanai arumukhanai guhanaip-pannirukai


anupallavi

  urugAda nenjattil orukAlum eTTAda
 uttama tiruttaNik-karuttanaik-karuttil vaittu


caraNam 1    shendil nAthanai aravinda pAdanai shikkal singAra vElanai shiva bAlanai
  caraNam 2    eLLileNNai malar maNam pOl maraindu niraindavan-kura
vaLLi anbikuLLam parikoDutta virutta vEdDttanai
  caraNam 3    pazhantamizh deivak-kandanaruL izhandarangAdE-tuyil
ezhundu aDiyar manadil tavazndu viLaiyADum kuzhandai
